title: Web Accessibility
description: The Sajilo Sarkar web portal is designed to be user-friendly and accessible to all citizens, regardless of their technological expertise.

title: 24/7 Availability
description: The portal provides a 24/7 facility to convey messages to the respective department, ensuring that citizens can report issues at any time.

title: Keyboard Navigation
description: Ensure that all interactive elements on the portal are accessible via keyboard for users with disabilities.

title: Screen Reader Support
description: All important elements on the portal are compatible with screen readers, providing text alternatives for non-text content.

title: Contrast and Text Size
description: Users can adjust contrast and text size settings to improve readability according to their needs.
